name: Conflux Loader
description: The Conflux Loader loads and injects user scripts from a configurable location.

authors.name: Kyle Kerslake
authors.institution: The Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center

system-settings.name:
Prefix of the Shazam External Module:

Example: If the Shazam EM is under directory shazam_v1.2.3, then the prefix to specify here is shazam

!!! READ ME FOR PRODUCTION SYSTEMS !!!

Force code load from directory:

Setting this value forces Conflux Loader modules to be loaded from subdirectories of this directory. Unspecified, a user can load code from any location in the instance's filesystem. Setting this value will alter the way that configured project-level paths are interpreted by the EM.

Example value: /var/www/html/edocs/loader_modules (after creating it)
